name: AbBench
abstract: Standardized antibody structure benchmark with curated splits for fair model comparison.

name: ParatopeAtlas
abstract: Annotated paratope and epitope interface atlas for antibody–antigen interaction studies.

name: AbDockSet
abstract: Docking-ready antibody–antigen complex set with decoys and evaluation metrics.

name: CDRFlex
abstract: CDR loop flexibility dataset with multi-state conformations and metadata for learning dynamics.

name: ImmuRepAtlas
abstract: Immune repertoire sequences across tissues and conditions for clonal tracking and embedding.

name: TCRpMHC
abstract: TCR–peptide–MHC interaction dataset for specificity modeling and binding prediction.

name: HLACoverage
abstract: HLA allele coverage and binding landscape dataset for immunogenicity screening workflows.

name: CytokineNet
abstract: Cytokine signaling interaction network dataset with perturbation annotations for immune modeling.
